message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it valuable.  I'm willing to part with it for $115.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your position, Bob, but $105 is cutting it a bit close for me.  How about we settle at $110?
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I'd like to propose $108. Would you be willing to meet me there?
